column5: Sharing newly renovated apartment, north west of downtown Dallas. It's about 10 minutes from Dallas love field airport. 15-18 minutes from downtown.   I have a very comfortable Mainstays sleeper couch. I can also setup an air mattress for the additional guest.  Just so there is no confusion, the other bed in the picture is meant for additional guest. I sleep in my own room.
column8: Shared space in a minimalist apt
